title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Pensonhurst has the higher money supply in Year 2 and/or does not explain that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvaiaab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D14@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Pensonhurst has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Pensonhurst has the higher money supply.

The response states that Pensonhurst has the higher money supply in Year 2 and explains that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvaiaab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D14@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Pensonhurst has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Pensonhurst has the higher money supply.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Pensonhurst experienced the higher real interest rate and/or does not explain that Pensonhurst had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

The response states that Pensonhurst experienced the higher real interest rate and explains that Pensonhurst had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that borrowers in Pensonhurst will be better off and/or does not explain that the real value of loans that will be repaid will be lower than expected because the actual inflation rate is greater than the expected inflation rate.

The response states that borrowers in Pensonhurst will be better off and explains that the real value of loans that will be repaid will be lower than expected because the actual inflation rate is greater than the expected inflation rate.
